pages.text: The $(item)Wooden Mallet$() is one of the key tools of Ultramarine. It can be used to toggle the different states on a number of blocks.

pages.title: Roof Tiles
pages.text: $(item)Roof Tiles$() can be toggled into a shifted position, shifting down by half block.

pages.title: Rafters
pages.text: $(item)Rafters$() can be toggled into a shifted position, shifting up by half block.

pages.title: Marble Railing
pages.text: $(item)White Marble Railing$() can be toggled into a shifted position, shifting down by half block. Using wooden mallet on the block while crouching will toggle the $(thing)"locked"$() state instead, locking and unlocking the central pillar.

pages.title: Chiral Blocks
pages.text: For certain blocks that have complex rotation, the mallet can be used to change the additional rotation state.
